pull.title: Add implementation to bip-0069.mediawiki
pull.body: Added the BitWasp BIP0069 implementation to the list of implementations

events.message:
Add implementation to bip-0069.mediawiki

Added the BitWasp BIP0069 implementation to the list of implementations

events.body: @luke-jr: is it inappropriate to ACK this without first verifying that the implementation works correctly?
IMO probably, but I'm not sure the trend agrees with me.
It passes tests taken from bitcoin-js, and a couple of others too.

Given that this PR went without response from the BIP author for over six years, it seems that the author is not interested in adopting this change into the BIP document. Further, the implementation to be added to the BIP appears to not have had any changes in the past four years. Please feel free to request reopening, if I misinterpreted that @kristovatlas.
